about_the_game:
Play your cards to explore a hangry realm, crafting and delivering exotic meals in the face of fantastical beasts and curses from dissatisfied customers.

Gameplay
Mage Food Truck is a single player roguelike deckbuilder. Each run consists of a Morning, Day, and Night shift, with turn events that become increasingly perilous. You'll play hands from your growing collection to traverse the realm, collect ingredients, craft recipes, and deliver them to earn as much gold as possible. When the day is done or your truck is wrecked, your customers will pass judgment upon you with a review of 0-3 stars!

Each work day begins with a small starter deck, and you’ll purchase new cards from the Turvy Mart at the end of each turn. Playing a Job card lets you use any crew member's ability, which you can combine with other cards to boost productivity!



  • The Explorer travels around the map, seeking ingredients and delivering food.
  • The Chef crafts delicious dishes from ingredients you've collected.
  • The Mage protects your truck with a magic shield and fights off pesky curses.
  • The Bard motivates your crew with EXP, unlocking powerful Special cards unique to each crew member.



Features
  • 3 Tutorial Scenarios & 2 Replayable Scenarios: Ease into the mechanics or dive in head first
  • Customizable difficulty: Add some spice in the Scoville menu to gain a score multiplier
  • 15+ ingredients make over 25 delicious illustrated recipes
  • 40+ Unique events to bless or curse your truck
  • Score Attack: Craft and deliver as much food as possible before your work day is over
  • Optional Vegetarian Mode: Eliminate meat & gain some unique recipes
  • Full controller support
